name: My Blue Heaven | Buried Series
description:
Buried Series:

The Buried Series is a collection of experimental/incomplete games that for whatever reason, I've stopped working on. Though, I've lost interest  with them, I think the work put in, still has some value worth sharing! 

Players Beware: Though these games are playable, I have no intention of putting any more time into them. Anyone interested should prepare for potential bugs, inconsistencies and major typos.

Thanks for playing!
